name: Rooster Teeth vs. Zombiens: Remember the Bungalow
summary: The Zombien invasion started in the Rooster Teeth studio, but it's spread... TO THE BUNGALOW. Fend off ravaging waves of Zombiens in a more open environment with less room to cower in terror within. Still, build your defenses, scavenge for weapons, and fight for your life in REMEMBER THE BUNGALOW for Rooster Teeth vs. Zombiens!
